name: Streets of Tennis
description:
Entry to the Mix and Game Jam 2020. Theme: Mixing Genres Quick Start
W A S D - Character movement
Space - Strike the ball

Launch the ball with your racket.
The ball is the only way to kill these abominations! 
Kill the entire wave and advance to the next stage. Good luck!

A LITTLE CONTEXT

A zombie outbreak has surprised you while playing tennis at your local -and fancy- Tennis Club.

Your former friends are now human-meat-hungry monsters.

The only way to survive is to use your Tennis skills against them.

HOW TO PLAY

Keyboard only.

Defend yourself!

The zombies slowly come from the right part of the screen trying to catch you. 

You can't kill them with your own hands, but can use your powerful Tennis strike to clear your way out of the zone.

Don't forget to eat!

If a zombie manages to hurt you, grab one of the tasty chicken dishes that spawn on the scenery.

Kill them all to progress!

After finishing the wave of enemies, a GO! prompt will appear, allowing you to enter the next area.

CREDITS
